name: nativescript-facebook
description: NativeScript plugin, wrapper of native Facebook SDK for Android and iOS.

scripts.build: npm i && tsc && tns plugin build && npm run ngc
scripts.build.iosOnly: npm i && tsc && npm run ngc
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ng.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ng.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.vue.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-vue && tns run ios --bundle --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.vue.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-vue && tns run android --bundle --syncAllFiles

author: NativeScript Team
